forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 54. West wind around 7 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the city begins to stir in the early hours, a gentle breeze carries with it the coolness of a clear night, the temperature resting around 54 degrees. The west wind whispers softly, promising a warm embrace as the sun rises, revealing a glorious day ahead. By midday, temperatures will rise to a comfortable 70, gradually dialing back to a mild 67 by afternoon. The golden sun is set to dominate the sky, banishing any clingy memories of fog that may have lingered from the night before.

The clarity of the day speaks to adventure; it beckons one to step outside, to engage with the urban tapestry that is San Francisco. This is a day for leisurely strolls through local parks where the vibrant hues of spring paint the earth, or perhaps an artful exploration of the city’s hidden gems in Chinatown, where the scent of dim sum wafts through the air. Dress lightly but sensibly; a light jacket will serve well against the wind while allowing the warmth of the sun to kiss your skin. An afternoon visit to the waterfront could be particularly delightful—where the gentle caress of the breeze complements the serenity of the bay. Today’s beauty is whispered in the rustle of leaves and the laughter of friends, urging you to take to the streets and enjoy what promises to be a splendid day.
